text: Martynas Andriukaitis (28 March 1981 - 4 September 2014) was a Lithuanian basketball player. In 2001, he became champion of both Lithuania and Latvia and vice-champion of North European Basketball League (NELB). He played professionally between 2001 and 2013 as a power forward. He played in Lithuania, Latvia, Georgia, Ukraine, Hungary and France. Andriukaitis was born in Kaunas. He was married to Renata and had one son. On 4 September 2014, Andriukaitis shot his wife before he shot himself in a suicide attempt at their home in Riga. Their 14-year-old son saw what happened and called the police and paramedics. Andriukaitis died later that day in hospital, aged 33. ==References== ==Other websites== * Martynas Andriukaitis at Basketball- Reference * Martynas Andriukaitis at the DELFI web portal site Category:1981 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Lithuanian basketball players Category:Murder-suicides in Europe Category:Power forwards Category:Sportspeople who committed suicide Category:Suicides by firearm
title: Martynas Andriukaitis
